players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob, can you tell us what you saw last night?"
Diana: "I saw Diana last night. She was the one who killed Charlie."
Bob: "I don't think Diana killed Charlie. I saw her last night, but she was just talking to herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
